title: Smart Data Models - PFVArType1IEEEVArController
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE VAR Controller Type 1 which operates by moving the voltage reference directly.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 11.3.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be PFVArType1IEEEVArController

tvarc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Var controller time delay ().  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0

vvar.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Synchronous machine power factor (). Default: 0.0

vvarcbw.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Var controller dead band ().  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0.0

vvarref.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Var controller reference (). Default: 0.0

vvtmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum machine terminal voltage needed for pf/var controller to be enabled (). Default: 0.0

vvtmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum machine terminal voltage needed to enable pf/var controller (). Default: 0.0
